data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Novgorod.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Novgorod, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: the state of Novgorod has (about) 9,280 people who know Jesus, 355,909 people who know about him culturally, and 268,911 people who are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Novgorod.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: God, guide the 9,280 believers in Novgorod to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Lord, remember the Yukagir people. Make the Yukagir people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Novgorod to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Novgorod, Russia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Novgorod, Russia has a population of 634,100.

We estimate Novgorod has 9,280 people who might know Jesus, 355,909 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 268,911 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Novgorod, Russia that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ
